00117 /*
00118  * main simulator interfaces, called in the following order
00119  */
00120 
00121 /* register simulator-specific options */
00122 void sim_reg_options(struct opt_odb_t *odb);
00123 
00124 /* main() parses options next... */
00125 
00126 /* check simulator-specific option values */
00127 void sim_check_options(struct opt_odb_t *odb, int argc, char **argv);
00128 
00129 /* register simulator-specific statistics */
00130 void sim_reg_stats(struct thread_t ** cores, struct stat_sdb_t *sdb);
00131 
00132 /* initialize the simulator: pre_init gets called before command-line
00133    argument parsing, post_init gets called after. */
00134 void sim_pre_init(void);
00135 void sim_post_init(void);
00136 
00137 /* main() prints the option database values next... */
00138 
00139 /* print simulator-specific configuration information */
00140 void sim_aux_config(FILE *stream);
00141 
00142 /* start simulation, program loaded, processor precise state initialized */
00143 void sim_main(void);
00144 
00145 /* main() prints the stats database values next... */
00146 
00147 /* dump simulator-specific auxiliary simulator statistics */
00148 void sim_aux_stats(FILE *stream);
00149 
00150 /* un-initialize simulator-specific state */
00151 void sim_uninit(void);
00152 
00153 /* print all simulator stats */
00154 void
00155 sim_print_stats(FILE *fd);              /* output stream */
00156 
00157 /*This is the component that subscribes to the manifold clock and cycle steps the cores and uncores*/
00158 /*The uncores form the boundary of the cycle accurate and discrete event components and thus they act as both. Th LLC which is part of the uncore is called in zesto_component every cycle*/
00159 /*But the uncore can accept messages at anytime from the network and forward them to the LLC so that it processes them the next time zesto_component calls them*/
00160 
00161 
00162 class zesto_component
00163 {
00164 public:
00165   zesto_component()
00166   {
00167         clock= new Clock(1);
00168         registerClock(clock, this, &zesto_component::uptick_handler, &zesto_component::downtick_handler);
00169   }
00170 
00171   Clock *clock;
00172   void uptick_handler();
00173   void downtick_handler();
00174 
00175   ~zesto_component()
00176   {
00177         delete(clock);
00178   }
00179 };
00180

00192 extern unsigned int max_phy_link_bits;

00195 extern unsigned int cores_per_node;
